title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), no declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is shown. The class hierarchies of the internal jars should be visible. Additionally, the meaning of the message is unclear.
OB: No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. The message should be clearer in its explanation.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a binary project
2. Select a class (e.g. org.apache.ant)
3. Press F4
